title: Ms. Y and Mr. X trade shoes and bread

content.prompt: According to the data, if Mr. X and Ms. Y have the opportunity to trade, which of the following will be mutually beneficial?

choices.label: Ms. Y sells shoes to and buys bread from Mr. X.
Ms. Y sells bread to and buys shoes from Mr. X.
Ms. Y sells both bread and shoes to Mr. X.
Ms. Y buys both bread and shoes from Mr. X.
Ms. Y and Mr. X do not trade with each other.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
